name: Onchain Machine Learning: Building the Intelligence of Autonomous Systems
description: Introducing Machine Learning into Autonomous Worlds is a key element in building complex, intelligent systems. In this talk, we’ll discuss how we can create a Verifiable Game AI agent through the TicTacToe example. We’ll understand the challenges and solutions for implementing ML in blockchain environments.

speakers.name: Ege Atesalp
speakers.bio: Ege Atesalp is a Data Scientist and Researcher at Giza specialized in verifiable Machine Learning systems.
